title.rendered: Free Gift Cards & Toys + Thanksgiving Hours + Small Business Sat. + Elf on the Shelf

content.rendered:
Gift Card Promotion

Don’t miss out on this deal! From November 24th through Christmas Eve, receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2017; limit of 10 free cards. Gift cards spend like cash. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Toy Sale: Buy 3 get 1 FREE

Stock up for Christmas with this amazing toy promotion! Our Buy 3, Get 1 Free sale begins November 24th and goes through Christmas Eve. This promo includes ALL toy lines! Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations. There is no limit of how many free items you’ll receive!

 

Thanksgiving Hours

We will be CLOSED Thanksgiving Day. Regular hours will resume 11/24

 

Small Business Saturday

Shop at Gottwals Books and other locally owned shops on Saturday, November 25 to show your support for small business. It’s easy to point-and-click your way through this Christmas shopping season, but spending your dollars with places like Gottwals Books has a MAJOR effect on our local economy. Please think twice before buying your books (new & used) and toys elsewhere!

 

Elf on the Shelf

Keep the Elf on the Shelf tradition alive in your homes this Christmas season. Buy this brand NEW set that includes the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+).
